thread.section_title: Littlewoodsireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Littlewoodsireland | www.littlewoodsireland.ie
thread.title: Mrs Grainne Miller
thread.title_full: Littlewoodsireland reviewed by Mrs Grainne Miller

author: Mrs Grainne Miller
title: Mrs Grainne Miller
text: Was ordering for the first time from them and oh my goodness what can ordeal had to change delivery address by phone thought nothing of it until a week later no sign of order but a letter saying my order was cancelled whoever took my details by phone had put my home address as business address for delivery therefore my card was declined as home address didn't match...not even a phone call to explain this my order was a present for my daughter's birthday thankfully I ordered it off a different company and it was ordered and delivered without a hitch NEVER AGAIN will I shop with Littlewoods
